name: Domination (itch)
description:
Take over the world with your Army of choice!

Take over the world by selecting a country you want to be stationed in and use their army to take over the whole world, but be careful: other Countries will try to stop what they don't like so always try to get them to co-operate with you...

Domination is a game made by TechDog CH

Get The full Game under:

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....

Game Jolt: http://gamejolt.com/games/domination/245895

Homepage: https://techdogch.wixsite.com/indie/domination
